LanguageData.BA_Raid.questContentRules.rulesStrings.3: defeated->The hostile [escortees_label] has been defeated and has dropped a [reward_label]!
LanguageData.BA_Raid.questContentRules.rulesStrings.4: manufacture->\n\nThe chip can also be used to create more advanced mechanoids.
LanguageData.BA_Raid.questContentRules.rulesStrings.5: study->\n\nYou can study the [reward_label] by selecting a mechanitor and right-clicking the chip. Studying a [reward_label] helps unlock higher tiers of mechtech research.
